textAfterTable: Directions: Sledding hill in Cummings Park. Merritt Parkway NORTH (RT.15): Take exit 35 High Ridge Road. Turn right off ramp onto High Ridge Road for about 3 miles to Cold Spring Road. Turn right onto Cold Spring Road for about 1.5 miles until lit becomes Washington Blvd., make a left on Tresser Blvd. To Elm Street. Make a right on Elm Street and bear right onto Shippan Avenue. Follow Shippan Avenue and Cummings Park will be on the left side (past People's Bank and the Fire Dept.). Comments: None Disclaimer: The webmaster of SledRiding.com is in no way responsible for trespassing (due to false information) and/or injury or death of any person or persons on any hills listed on this website. Go sledding at your own risk. With that said, check out the snow sleds here! County: Fairfield City: Stratford Property: Public Permission: Yes Designated Sledding Area: No Turf: Grass Texture: Smooth Crowds:
